name: International Conference on Frontiers in Engineering, Management and Science
content: International Conference on Frontiers in Engineering, Management and Science (ICFEMS -2022) to be held from 27th to 28th April 2022 is a unique opportunity to discuss the recent developments in various areas of Technology / Engineering, Science and Management. It aims at creating technological awareness and also bringing researchers, academicians, students, technocrats and scientists in a common platform. The research works / proposed approaches are evaluated with experts and guided towards improvisation. All the accepted papers will be published during the conference proceedings.It will be recommended for journal publications with complete work carried out by authors.
